refnamediv.refpurpose: specifying software license and optional reference to license text

refsection.para: In package.xml 1.0, the license tag only contained the name of the license. In package.xml 2.0, there are two optional attributes, "uri" and "filesource". "uri" contains a uri that identifies the text of a license, such as "&url.license.php;" for the PHP License. "filesource" can be used to specify a LICENSE file within an actual package that contains the text of the license.
